plot: Set in the early 1960s in Aqua Prieta, an Arizona / Mexico border town, El Camino Del Diablo is an erotic drama that transcends gender barriers in a world of innocence lost.
title: El camino del diablo
plot_es: Set in the early 1960s in Aqua Prieta, an Arizona / Mexico border town, El Camino Del Diablo is an erotic drama that transcends gender barriers in a world of innocence lost.
plot_en: Set in the early 1960s in Aqua Prieta, an Arizona / Mexico border town, El Camino Del Diablo is an erotic drama that transcends gender barriers in a world of innocence lost.
